description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"call to submissions: short stories","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-1"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"we are always on the lookout for short stories to include in our annual anthology, the first edition of which you can find ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://9vtbackslash5.com/catalogue/between-there-and-now-too"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"submissions can be fiction, nonfiction or in between, and any genre and length.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"there is no limit to the number of submissions one can send, and we accept previously published work.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"we read every submission we receive, and strive to respond to all those interested in due time.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
